about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!
Attention! All the ships included in the packs are delivered assembled. Re-equipment is possible for in-game currency.

This bundle includes
  • Jericho rank 14 destroyer Tyrant

Unique destroyer weapon
  • “Thermoactive weapon”.
  • Critical hit chance increases as the weapons heat up.

Unique destroyer module
  • Active module “Isotope Harvester”.
  • A special drone generates a field with a radius of 500 m. The drone begins to move toward the destroyer at a given speed, dealing damage to all opponents who enter the field. The damage is higher when the enemies are closer to the drone. Upon arrival to the ship, the drone restores the shield in proportion to the damage dealt.
  • Shield modifier “Warp stream detector”.
  • With the death of an enemy in a radius of 2000 m. the destroyer's shield is partially restored.

In addition, pilots will receive special weapons for support class destroyers:
  • Active module “Photon emitter”
  • Active module “Gravitational lens”

“Gzhel” colouring scheme

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 7 days!

The first Jericho Destroyer, Tyrant was created in the XLII century, shortly before the third war for the Bartle sector. It was created under the watchful eye of the Oracles, as a response to the imperial Invincible. The powerful Tyrant was used in conjunction with small vessels during raids on unprotected colonies deep in the rear of the former Direktorium. Despite the considerable age of this destroyer, in most parameters it is not inferior to modern models, and in some ways even surpasses them.

Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!
Attention! All the ships included in the packs are delivered assembled. Re-equipment is possible for in-game currency.

This bundle includes
  • Jericho rank 14 destroyer Tyrant

Unique destroyer weapon
  • “Thermoactive weapon”.
  • Critical hit chance increases as the weapons heat up.

Unique destroyer module
  • Active module “Isotope Harvester”.
  • A special drone generates a field with a radius of 500 m. The drone begins to move toward the destroyer at a given speed, dealing damage to all opponents who enter the field. The damage is higher when the enemies are closer to the drone. Upon arrival to the ship, the drone restores the shield in proportion to the damage dealt.
  • Shield modifier “Warp stream detector”.
  • With the death of an enemy in a radius of 2000 m. the destroyer's shield is partially restored.

In addition, pilots will receive special weapons for support class destroyers:
  • Active module “Photon emitter”
  • Active module “Gravitational lens”

“Gzhel” colouring scheme

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 7 days!

The first Jericho Destroyer, Tyrant was created in the XLII century, shortly before the third war for the Bartle sector. It was created under the watchful eye of the Oracles, as a response to the imperial Invincible. The powerful Tyrant was used in conjunction with small vessels during raids on unprotected colonies deep in the rear of the former Direktorium. Despite the considerable age of this destroyer, in most parameters it is not inferior to modern models, and in some ways even surpasses them.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern Ubuntu distributions 13.04 or higher, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Snow Leopard
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel HD 3000, HD 4000
  • Hard Drive: 8.5 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Drive: 8.5 GB
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional: Not recommended for Intel integrated graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks
